title: Need to set USE_GCC8 variable in ignition-abichecker.bash

content.raw:
We are currently setting the `USE_GCC8` variable in the docker scripts for each ignition package:

* #!/osrf/release-tools/src/0094c09b5f43076fb246d9c08643bffd960f8ae7/jenkins-scripts/docker/ign_transport-compilation.bash?at=default&fileviewer=file-view-default#ign_transport-compilation.bash-33
* #!/osrf/release-tools/src/0094c09b5f43076fb246d9c08643bffd960f8ae7/jenkins-scripts/docker/ign_physics-compilation.bash?at=default&fileviewer=file-view-default#ign_physics-compilation.bash-21

This variable is never set in the [ignition-abichecker.bash](#!/osrf/release-tools/src/0094c09b5f43076fb246d9c08643bffd960f8ae7/jenkins-scripts/docker/ignition-abichecker.bash?at=default&fileviewer=file-view-default) script, though, so it is failing for various packages:

* [![Build Status](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=ignition_transport-abichecker-any_to_any-ubuntu_auto-amd64&build=11)](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_transport-abichecker-any_to_any-ubuntu_auto-amd64/11/) https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_transport-abichecker-any_to_any-ubuntu_auto-amd64/11/
* [![Build Status](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=ignition_physics-abichecker-any_to_any-ubuntu_auto-amd64&build=33)](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_physics-abichecker-any_to_any-ubuntu_auto-amd64/33/) https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_physics-abichecker-any_to_any-ubuntu_auto-amd64/33/

We could try looking in the pipeline script to see if it is installing gcc8?

cc @\_jrivero_
content.html:
We are currently setting the USE_GCC8 variable in the docker scripts for each ignition package:

  • #!/osrf/release-tools/src/0094c09b5f43076fb246d9c08643bffd960f8ae7/jenkins-scripts/docker/ign_transport-compilation.bash?at=default&fileviewer=file-view-default#ign_transport-compilation.bash-33
  • #!/osrf/release-tools/src/0094c09b5f43076fb246d9c08643bffd960f8ae7/jenkins-scripts/docker/ign_physics-compilation.bash?at=default&fileviewer=file-view-default#ign_physics-compilation.bash-21

This variable is never set in the ignition-abichecker.bash script, though, so it is failing for various packages:

  • https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_transport-abichecker-any_to_any-ubuntu_auto-amd64/11/
  • https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_physics-abichecker-any_to_any-ubuntu_auto-amd64/33/

We could try looking in the pipeline script to see if it is installing gcc8?

cc @_jrivero_
